facades

Class CompanyFacade

  • java.lang.Object
    • facades.CompanyFacade
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ClientFacade

    public class CompanyFacade
extends java.lang.Object
implements ClientFacade
    With this company facade (the layer for the business logic) company can perform various actions relating to its details & coupons
